		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,

		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,

		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> stgOffre
source(output(
		{affecte/non_affecte} as string,
		{plateforme/vente directe} as string,
		{origine de la ligne} as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		{Code client livré} as string,
		{code client plateforme livree} as string,
		{code produit} as string,

		ca as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque as string,
		marque_code as string,

		{nom du canal} as string,
		canal_distribution_final as string,
		canal_final as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{ATC offre} as string,
		{ATC livré} as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		qt_ecc_enrichi as string,
		ca_ecc_enrichi as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		source_atc as string,
		Successor as string,
		CDis as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Deb val} as string,
		N1groupe as string,
		N2groupe as string,
		N3groupe as string,
		N4groupe as string,
		N5groupe as string,
		N6groupe as string,
		N7groupe as string,
		N1groupedesignation as string,
		N2groupedesignation as string,
		N3groupedesignation as string,
		N4groupedesignation as string,
		N5groupedesignation as string,
		N6groupedesignation as string,
		N7groupedesignation as string,
		N1localedesignation as string,
		N2localedesignation as string,
		N3localedesignation as string,
		N4localedesignation as string,
		N5localedesignation as string,
		N6localedesignation as string,
		N7localedesignation as string,
		N1locale as string,
		N2locale as string,
		N3locale as string,
		N4locale as string,
		N5locale as string,
		N6locale as string,
		N7locale as string,
		{Hiérarchgroupe} as string,
		{Hiérarchlocale} as string,
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Nom du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{EPS_Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{EPS_Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		Client as string,
		{Numéro client indirect} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		ATC as string,
		canal as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Numero Interne_ Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> baseCommerciale
Filter1 aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		{Référence},
		Canal,
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		{Numéro interne 1},
		{Négoce},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI),
	{Date fin de validité} = max({Date de validité}),
		{Quantité de l'offre} = sum(toInteger({Quantité})),
		Quantite_P1N = first(PotentielP1N),
		Quantite_P2N = first(PotentielP2N),
		Quantite_P3N = first(PotentielP3N),
		Quantite_P4N = first(PotentielP4N),
		Quantite_P5N = first(PotentielP5N),
		Quantite_P6N = first(PotentielP6N)) ~> aggregationOffre
stgOffre filter(!isNull(Offre)) ~> Filter1
baseCommerciale filter(!isNull(no_offre)) ~> offreNotNull
offreNotNull aggregate(groupBy({plateforme/vente directe},
		no_offre,
		{code produit},
		canal_final),
	{qte consommée} = sum(toInteger(quantite)),
		{dernière facturation année} = max(toInteger(year)),
		{dernière facturation mois} = max(toInteger(month))) ~> aggregationBase
aggregationOffre, aggregationBase join(Offre == no_offre
	&& {Référence} == {code produit}
	&& Canal == canal_final,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive({Date de dernière facturation de l'offre} = toString({dernière facturation année})+"-"+toString({dernière facturation mois}),
		Canal = "Diffus") ~> yearmonth
yearmonth select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		{Référence},
		Canal,
		{Date fin de validité},
		{Sum_Quantité} = {Quantité de l'offre},
		Quantite_P1N,
		Quantite_P2N,
		Quantite_P3N,
		Quantite_P4N,
		Quantite_P5N,
		Quantite_P6N,
		{Quantité consommée} = {qte consommée},
		{Date de dernière facturation de l'offre},
		{Statut offre},
		Responsable,
		{Numéro interne 1},
		{Négoce},
		{Numéro interne 2},
		CODE_CMI,
		NOM_CMI
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['SUIVI_OFFRE_DIFFUS.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FacturationBW
FacturationBW keyGenerate(output(CleDataSD as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> RecordID
RecordID derive(DateExt = "",
		DocVte_Long = "",
		DateCRE = "") ~> DateExtDocVteLongDateCRE
DateExtDocVteLongDateCRE select(mapColumn(
		OrgCial = {Org. commerciale},
		CanalDist = {Canal distribution},
		SectAct = {Secteur d'activité},
		DocVte = {Document de vente},
		Poste,
		Date = {Jour calendaire},
		DRCde = {Agence commerciale corrigé},
		ATCCde = {ATC Corrigé},
		CliCde = {Donneur d'ordre},
		CliLiv = {Récept. de march.},
		CliFac = {Destinataire facture},
		NoArt = Article,
		TypDocVte = {Type doc. vente},
		TypPoste = {Type de poste},
		NoLiv = Livraison,
		TypLiv = {Type de livraison},
		TypPostLiv = {Type poste Livraison},
		NoFac = Facture,
		TypFac = {Type de facture},
		TypPostFac = {Type poste Facture},
		Mois = {Mois calendrier},
		An = {Année civile},
		RaiCde = {Motif commande},
		QtCde = {Qté cdée},
		ValNet = {CA cdé},
		QtLiv = {Qté livrée},
		ValLiv = {CA livré},
		QtFac = {Qté facturée},
		ValFac = {CA facturé},
		StdCost = {Cout standard cdé},
		FabCost = {Cout fabrication},
		StdCostLiv = {Cout standard livré},
		StdCostFac = {Cout standard facturé},
		CleDataSD,
		DateExt,
		DocVte_Long,
		DateCRE
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Rename
Rename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		year as string,
		month as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		agence_code as string,
		marque as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		rcount as string,
		indexcols2 as string,
		qte_ecc as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['SortieTDataSD.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> SortieTDataSD

source(output(
		societe as string,
		region_lib as string,
		sgeo as string,
		sgeo_lib as string,
		agence as string,
		agence_lib as string,
		dep_ag as string,
		frs as string,
		article as string,
		article_lib as string,
		dm as string,
		ref_frs as string,
		{vva (m) n} as string,
		{vva (m) n-1} as string,
		{qte (m) n} as string,
		{qte (m) n-1} as string,
		{vva (c) n} as string,
		{vva (c) n-1} as string,
		{qte (c) n} as string,
		{qte (c) n-1} as string,
		{var. vva (m)} as string,
		{var. qte (m)} as string,
		{var. vva (c)} as string,
		{var. qte (c)} as string,
		path as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ECOULEMENT
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerShortName as string,
		UnitID as string,
		POSid as string,
		POSdescription as string,
		County as string,
		POSSAMid as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		SupplierID as string,
		BrandID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> organisation
source(output(
		yearmonth as string,
		Article as string,
		{Code client} as string,
		{Qt� vente directe} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ventesDirectes
rename derive(yearmonth = replace(split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[1], "-", ""),
		canal = split(split(path, "/")[3], "_")[2],
		qte_ecoulement = toDouble(qte_ecoulement)) ~> yearmonthANDcanal
yearmonthANDcanal derive(year = substring(yearmonth, 1, 4),
		month = substring(yearmonth, 5, 2)) ~> yearANDmonth
yearANDmonth filter(!isNull(agence_code)) ~> agenceCodeNotNull
organisation filter(!isNull(POSid)) ~> posIDNotNull
agenceCodeNotNull, uniqueOrganisation join(agence_code == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerOrganisation
posIDNotNull aggregate(groupBy(POSid,
		HubSAPid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID),
		WholeSalerShortName = max(WholeSalerShortName),
		UnitID = max(UnitID),
		POSdescription = max(POSdescription),
		County = max(County),
		POSSAMid = max(POSSAMid),
		SupplierID = max(SupplierID),
		BrandID = max(BrandID),
		WholeSalerHubID = max(WholeSalerHubID),
		HubName = max(HubName),
		SectorID = max(SectorID)) ~> uniqueOrganisation
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> innerVentesDirectes
innerVentesDirectes derive(qte_ecoulement = qte_ecoulement-toDouble({Qt� vente directe})) ~> deleteVentesDirectes
ECOULEMENT select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code = agence,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file = frs,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference = ref_frs,
		qte_ecoulement = {qte (m) n},
		path
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
innerOrganisation, ventesDirectes join(yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth == ventesDirectes@yearmonth
	&& reference == Article
	&& POSSAMid == {Code client},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> leftVentesDirectes
leftVentesDirectes filter(isNull(Article) || isNull(ventesDirectes@yearmonth) || isNull({Code client})) ~> outerLeftVentesDirectes
deleteVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
outerLeftVentesDirectes select(mapColumn(
		societe,
		region_lib,
		sgeo,
		sgeo_lib,
		agence_code,
		agence_lib,
		dep_ag,
		marque_file,
		article_lib,
		dm,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		path,
		yearmonth = yearmonthANDcanal@yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		POSid,
		HubSAPid,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerShortName,
		UnitID,
		POSdescription,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		SupplierID,
		BrandID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		SectorID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select1, Select2 union(byName: true)~> Union1
marquename select(mapColumn(
		distributeur = societe,
		agence_code,
		marque_file,
		reference,
		qte_ecoulement,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		year,
		month,
		HubSAPid,
		County,
		POSSAMid,
		marque_id = BrandID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> uniformisation
Union1 derive(marque_name = "SaunierDuval",
		marque = "1604",
		marque_num = "1604") ~> marquename
uniformisation sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		yearmonth as string,
		qte_ecoulement as string,
		ca_ecoulement as string,
		POSSAMidString as string,
		HubSAPid as string,
		reference as string,
		distributeur as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		marque_name as string,
		is_prix_dsc as string,
		qte_ecc as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activit�} as string,
		document_vente as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrig�} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{R�cept. de march.} as string,
		Right_reference as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Qt� factur�e} as string,
		{CA factur�} as string,
		Right_HubSAPid as string,
		{Type_Facturation�} as string,
		qt_fact as string,
		ca_final as string,
		qt_final as string,
		data_origin as string,
		canal_final as string,
		Commande as string,
		no_offre as string,
		{ATC Performance} as string,
		canal as string,
		RowCount as string,
		ATC as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		code_postal_atc as string,
		NomATC as string,
		Matricule as string,
		date_id as string,
		HubName as string,
		id_canal_final as string,
		{qte plateforme final} as string,
		{ca plateforme final} as string,
		Sum_qt_factur_e as string,
		Sum_ca_factur_ as string,
		Sum_ca_ecoulement as string,
		Sum_qte_ecoulement as string,
		code_depot as string,
		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	partitionFileNames:['TEREVA_ECOUL_PREPARED.csv'],

		SectorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,

		WholeSalerID as string,

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrgaTerevas
ecoulement select(mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal} = {code postal},
		marque_name
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> filterColumnsToUse
EccAddToReplicate split(in(["dsc",'tereva'],lower(distributeur)),
	disjoint: false) ~> filterDistrubitor@(dscTereva, notDscTereva)
filterColumnsToUse derive(toreplicate = abs( toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF ) )) ~> AvoirAddToReplicate
Select1 derive(toreplicate = abs(toInteger( qte_ecoulement ))) ~> EccAddToReplicate
DerivedColumn1 split(in(["2","7"], CompanyId),
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DscTerevaAvoir, NotDscTerevaAvoir)
salerDSC, OrgaTerevas union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 aggregate(groupBy(POSid),
	WholeSalerID = max(WholeSalerID)) ~> uniqueAgenceCode
AvoirAddToReplicate derive(ca_avoir = toFloat(PA_Valide_VGF),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+Mois  ),
		Qte_Validee_VGF = toInteger( Qte_Validee_VGF )) ~> DerivedColumn1
Select2, uniqueAgenceCode join(Agence == POSid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
ConditionalSplit1@DscTerevaAvoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid,
		toreplicate,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Join1 filter(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0) ~> positiveQuantite
filterDistrubitor@dscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index),
		rcount = 1) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		yearmonth,
		year,
		month,
		qte_ecoulement,
		ca_ecoulement,
		POSSAMidString,
		HubSAPid,
		reference,
		distributeur,
		agence_code,
		marque,
		{Code postal},
		marque_name,
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		rcount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 window(over(yearmonth,
		agence_code,
		reference),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(agence_code, true),
	asc(reference, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
filterDistrubitor@notDscTereva derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(qte_ecoulement)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn5
DerivedColumn5 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),

		HubSAPid,

	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(HubSAPid, true),

positiveQuantite derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn6
Flatten3 window(over(yearmonth,
		Agence,
		NoArtVGF),
	asc(yearmonth, true),
	asc(Agence, true),
	asc(NoArtVGF, true),
	indexcols2 = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
DerivedColumn6 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(

		NoOffre,
		NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,

		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		POSid,
		WholeSalerID,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Window3 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+Agence+NoArtVGF+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_avoir = iif(toInteger(Qte_Validee_VGF) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn7
Window2 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+HubSAPid+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn8
Window1 derive(indexcols2 = yearmonth+agence_code+reference+toString(indexcols2),
		qte_ecc = iif(toInteger(qte_ecoulement) >0, 1, -1 )) ~> DerivedColumn9

source(output(
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Article as string,
		{Type doc. vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> facturationbw
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PLATEFORMES
facturationbw derive(date_id = replace({Jour calendaire},'-','')) ~> transfoDate
transfoDate derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> extractYearMonth
extractYearMonth derive(year = substring(date_id,1,4),
		yearmonth = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthh
extractYearMonthh derive(fact_filter = iif ( ({Type de facture} =='YFAR' && ({Motif commande}=='FAS')  ||  ( {Type de facture}=='YFAB' && {Motif commande}=='FAS' )) ,1,0)) ~> FactFilterc
FactFilterc derive(qt_cd_e = {Qté cdée},
		ca_cd_ = {CA cdé},
		qt_livr_e = {Qté livrée},
		ca_livr_ = {CA livré},
		qt_factur_e = {Qté facturée},
		ca_factur_ = {CA facturé},
		cout_standard_cd_ = {Cout standard cdé},
		cout_fabrication = {Cout fabrication},
		cout_standard_livr_ = {Cout standard livré},
		cout_standard_factur_ = {Cout standard facturé}) ~> AddColumn
AddColumn derive(year_month = substring(date_id,1,6)) ~> extractYearMonthc
extractYearMonthc filter(fact_filter==0 && !isNull(Article)) ~> FactFilter
FactFilter select(mapColumn(
		{ Org. commerciale} = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Récept. de march.},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{ vente} = {Type doc. vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		date_id,
		year,
		yearmonth,
		fact_filter,
		qt_cd_e,
		ca_cd_,
		qt_livr_e,
		ca_livr_,
		qt_factur_e,
		ca_factur_,
		cout_standard_cd_,
		cout_fabrication,
		cout_standard_livr_,
		cout_standard_factur_,
		year_month,
		reference = Article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1, PLATEFORMES join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 filter(isNull( HubSAPid )) ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['TUTO_OUTPUT1.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> venteDirect

		{Quantité} as string,
		Client as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Offre as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		Canal as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		Source as string,
		UserLowerCase as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Offre
Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		HubSAPid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
selectAvoir, organisaation join(selectAvoir@HubSAPid == organisaation@HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Facturation, organisaation join({Récept. de march.} == HubSAPid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join1 filter(toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> Filter1
Filter1 derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		canal = iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(NoOffre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC")),
		yearmonth = iif(toInteger(Mois)<10, {Année}+"0"+Mois  ,   {Année}+"0"+Mois  )) ~> typeCast
Select1 derive(id_canal_final = iif(canal=="FP", 45,     iif(canal=="FS", 51,     iif(canal=="FC", 43, 42))),
		tOrigin = "avoir") ~> mapCanalID
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = {Org. commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Document de vente},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		POSSAMidString = {Récept. de march.},
		reference = Article,
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		month,
		yearmonth,
		HubSAPid,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> efacturation
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> inner
Join2 derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn1
mapCanalID, efacturation join({Année} == toInteger(year)
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullLeft
mapCanalID, efacturation join(Select1@HubSAPid == efacturation@HubSAPid
	&& Select1@reference == efacturation@reference
	&& Mois == toInteger(month)
	&& {Année} == toInteger(year),
	joinType:'right',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> fullRight
typeCast select(mapColumn(

fullLeft filter(isNull(efacturation@tOrigin)) ~> left

		id_canal_final = toString(id_canal_final)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(

fullRight filter(isNull(mapCanalID@tOrigin)) ~> right
right select(mapColumn(

	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 derive(data_origin = "facturation") ~> DerivedColumn3
inner select(mapColumn(
		NoOffre,
		reference = Select1@reference,
		qt_final = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		ca_final = PA_Valide_VGF,
		HubSAPid = Select1@HubSAPid,

		canal,
		id_canal_final,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		Poste,
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d ordre} = {Donneur d'ordre},

DerivedColumn4 select(mapColumn(

		HubSAPid,
		ca_final,
		qt_final,
		canal,
		id_canal_final,

		data_origin

DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(

		id_canal as string,
		marque_code as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		Client as string,
		Marque as string,
		{ATC Corrig�} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		marque_id as string,
		Offre as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DataCommercialDT2

source(output(
		{Clé Référentiel} as string,
		{Recherche Clé EPS} as string,
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as integer,
		{Code Postal fin} as integer,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		DR_x as string,
		matches as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		DR_y as string,
		{Secteur prime} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Secteur DEC} as string,
		Rallye as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> atcJoined
atcJoined filter(!isNull(ATC)) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR_x,
		matches,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR_y,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive({Canal final} = iif( in(["Vaillant diffus","SD diffus"], {Plan primes}), "Diffus" ,"Chantier" ),
		toreplicate = {Code Postal fin}-{Code Postal début}+1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 filter({Code Postal début}<= {Code Postal fin}) ~> Filter2
Filter2 derive(dd = mapLoop(abs(toInteger(toreplicate)), #index)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 foldDown(unroll(dd, dd),
	mapColumn(
		{Clé Référentiel},
		{Recherche Clé EPS},
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		DR_x,
		matches,
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		DR_y,
		{Secteur prime},
		Matricule,
		{Secteur DEC},
		Rallye,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 derive(dd = toInteger(dd) -1) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn3 derive({Code postal} = {Code Postal début}+dd) ~> DerivedColumn4
DerivedColumn4 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['referentiel_atc.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> AtcprepareForReplicate

in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared atcc2021 = let
  AdfDoc = AzureStorage.BlobContents("https://dsvaillantfr.blob.core.windows.net/data-warehouse/Temp/atc_c2021_lower"),
  Csv = Csv.Document(AdfDoc, [Delimiter = ",", Encoding = TextEncoding.Utf8, QuoteStyle = QuoteStyle.Csv]),
  PromotedHeaders = Table.PromoteHeaders(Csv, [PromoteAllScalars = true])
in
  PromotedHeaders;
shared UserQuery = let

  #"Choose columns" = Table.SelectColumns(Source, {"Clé Référentiel", "Marque", "Code Postal début", "Code Postal fin", "Utilisateur", "Fonction", "Département", "DR"})
in
  #"Choose columns";
